name: MTLTextureSwizzle
desc: A set of options to choose from when creating a texture swizzle pattern.

items.name: case alpha
items.desc: The alpha channel of the source pixel is copied to the destination channel.

items.name: case blue
items.desc: The blue channel of the source pixel is copied to the destination channel.

items.name: case green
items.desc: The green channel of the source pixel is copied to the destination channel.

items.name: case red
items.desc: The red channel of the source pixel is copied to the destination channel.

items.name: case one
items.desc: A value of 1.0 is copied to the destination channel.

items.name: case zero
items.desc: A value of 0.0 is copied to the destination channel.
